Class bartMachine_a_base

  • java.lang.Object
    • bartMachine.Classifier

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    bartMachine_b_hyperparams

    public abstract class bartMachine_a_base
extends Classifier
implements java.io.Serializable
    The base class for any BART implementation. Contains mostly instance variables and settings for the algorithm
    Author:
    Adam Kapelner and Justin Bleich
